directive.name: filelog
directive.param: If this parameter is set to a number log files older than this number of days are purged.
directive.content: The filelog does not read its content, instead it uses it as repository for log files.
directive.desc: This logger writes a set of files, rolling each night at 24 UTC. The files are named by the iso-8601 dates. A separate process manages the log file and the rolling.
